title: A Dreamer's Today: Excerpts from an overactive mind
description: A Dreamer's Today is a book of short stories with characters that deal with various issues ranging from being stalked by a best friend to the duplicitous cheating of a husband and wife. Each character has a story to share and an issue to deal with. Ride the roller coaster of these life-like dreams from Author E. L. R. Jones.
author: E.L.R.  Jones
